title: Provides for HIV-related testing without consent of the subject or another authorized to give consent where health care or other worker potentially endangered
summary: Provides for HIV-related testing without consent of the subject or another authorized to give consent where health care or other worker is potentially endangered; authorizes disclosure of confidential HIV-related information by a health care facility to a physician and by a physician to an endangered worker in such cases.
